long_description: Perfect for lengthy day hikes, the lightweight Deuter Futura 32 Pack features a flexible twin-frame construction and effective, 3-sided air circulation for ventilated comfort. Compact, anatomically shaped hipbelt with a spacious pocket for a smartphone, camera or snacks; pull-forward closure for quick and precise hipbelt adjustment. Soft, anatomically shaped air-mesh shoulder straps with load adjustment straps. AIRCOMFORT ventilated back system helps reduce perspiration by up to 25%. Bellowed and stretch side pockets; lid pocket; internal valuables pocket; wet laundry compartment. Ice tool and hiking pole attachment loops; top lid attachment loops; hydration sleeve and reflective attachment for drinking tube (reservoir sold separately). The Deuter Futura 32 Pack features a separate bottom compartment, detachable rain cover, side compression straps and an SOS label.
short_description: Perfect for lengthy day hikes, the lightweight Deuter Futura 32 Pack features a flexible twin-frame construction and effective, 3-sided air circulation for ventilated comfort.
